ItemDesc: Upon use, immediately restores all ally characters' HP by <unbreak>50%</unbreak> of their respective missing HP when entering battle.
ItemBGDesc: The work schedule for Banamonth Banaday is as follows: - Brainstorming meeting - Script review - Storyboard adjustments - Are we going out for tropical banana rice after work? "Dude, why did you post the work schedule on the consumables production sheet?" "Oh, banana it, I'm so busy I messed up... Oh well, let's just embrace the mistakenana."
